stories.title: OpenAI Retires GPT-4o Amid User Backlash
stories.summary: OpenAI officially retires GPT-4o and several other models, pushing users to GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.2 despite community complaints about the new models' overly flowery writing style.

stories.title: Anthropic Raises $30B at $380B Valuation
stories.summary: Anthropic closes massive Series G funding led by GIC and Coatue, cementing its position as OpenAI's primary competitor with a $380B post-money valuation.

stories.title: AI Startup Founder Warns of COVID-Level Disruption
stories.summary: HyperWrite CEO Matt Shumer's viral essay compares current AI moment to February 2020, warning that job disruption will be 'much bigger than COVID' and urging preparation.

stories.title: Elon Musk Slams Anthropic as 'Misanthropic and Evil'
stories.summary: Musk accuses Anthropic AI models of racial and demographic bias in scathing X post, escalating rivalry between xAI and Anthropic.
